'''1.16.21''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released only for the Nintendo Switch on August 20, 2020, which fixed a stability issue relating to the home screen while signed in.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360048475071|title=Minecraft - 1.16.21 (Switch Only)|date=August 20, 2020}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''Performance / Stability'''
* Fixed stability issues discovered when interacting with Minecraft and the home screen while signed in to Microsoft Accounts ({{bug|MCPE-95621}})
